app.title: üéÅ My Gift Cards
intro.description: Manage all your gift cards and fidelity cards in one place, right in your browser. Your data stays private and secure on your device.
intro.add_cards_desc: Store gift cards and fidelity cards with card numbers and balances
intro.track_spending_desc: Record transactions and monitor your remaining balance
intro.scan_barcodes_desc: Generate barcodes from your card numbers for easy scanning
intro.local_storage_desc: All data stored securely in your browser - no servers, no tracking
cards.title: My Gift Cards
archived.title: üì¶ Archived Cards
archived.description: Cards that have been archived. You can unarchive or permanently delete them.
export.title: Data Management
export.description: Export your data as a backup or import previously exported data.
alert.card_exists: A card with this number already exists!
alert.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this gift card? This action cannot be undone.
alert.export_failed: Failed to export data. Please try again.
alert.import_invalid: Invalid data format: missing cards array
alert.import_invalid_id: Invalid card data: id must be a non-empty string
alert.import_invalid_number: Invalid card data: number must be a non-empty string
alert.import_invalid_name: Invalid card data: name must be a non-empty string
alert.import_invalid_transactions: Invalid card data: transactions must be an array
alert.import_invalid_balance: Invalid card data: initialBalance must be null or a number
alert.import_invalid_current: Invalid card data: currentBalance must be null or a number
alert.import_confirm: This will replace all current data ({current} cards) with imported data ({imported} cards). Continue?
alert.import_read_failed: Failed to read file. Please try again.
alert.fidelity_no_transactions: Transactions are not supported for fidelity cards.
